vestige.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small part or amount of something that remains when most of it no longer exists
vestige.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The new law removed the last vestiges of royal power.
vestige.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the smallest possible amount of a quality or feeling
